results.name: First differences of the rows in the triangle of A116853, starting with 0.
comment: Row n contains the first differences of row n of A116853, starting with T(n,1) = A116853(n,1) - 0.
As in A116853, 0! = 1 is omitted here. - _Georg Fischer_, Mar 23 2019
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
For example, row 4 (11, 3, 4, 6) are first differences along row 4 of A116853: ((0), 11, 14, 18, 24).
maple: A116853 := proc(n,k) option remember ; if n = k then n! ; else procname(n,k+1)-procname(n-1,k) ; end if; end proc:
A116854 := proc(n,k) if k = 1 then A116853(n,1) ; else A116853(n,k) -A116853(n,k-1) ; end if; end proc:
